welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Mount Prospect, USA! Get ready to experience the charming small-town feel, rich history, and abundance of outdoor activities this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mount Prospect has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and several others.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Southwest and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves international flights for budget airlines such as Spirit and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic and international flights for various airlines including American and United.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
